name: Freedom Store
subtitle: Apps Empowering Individual Freedom
description: Your marketplace for apps dedicated to protecting your privacy and personal rights.

apps.name: Vexl
apps.localizedDescription: Vexl is a private, trust-based Bitcoin trading app that lets you buy and sell directly with people in your social network — no KYC, no middlemen, no public ratings. Built with end-to-end encryption and a privacy-first design, Vexl protects your data while empowering you to trade Bitcoin securely through real connections.

versions.localizedDescription: In this version we introduced security updates, app optimization & bug fixes.

privacy.NSCalendarsFullAccessUsageDescription: Vexl needs access to your calendar for scheduling trade meetings. Your data is kept private and only used for coordinating trades.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Vexl needs access to your calendar for scheduling trade meetings. Your data is kept private and only used for coordinating trades.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Vexl wants to access your camera in order to take a photo for your avatar or scan QR code to add other users to your Vexl network.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Vexl needs access to your contacts to make your offers visible for them in a secure way. Phone number of contacts you select will be encrypted and uploaded to the server.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Vexl needs access to FaceID to secure your account and make it easier to log in.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Vexl needs access to you location to show your position on the map. Location will never be share with anyone (even ourselves).
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Vexl wants to access your photos in order to select a picture for your avatar.
privacy.NSRemindersFullAccessUsageDescription: Vexl needs access to your reminders for scheduling trade meetings. Your data is kept private and only used for coordinating trades.
privacy.NSRemindersUsageDescription: Vexl needs access to your reminders for scheduling trade meetings. Your data is kept private and only used for coordinating trades.

versions.localizedDescription: In this version, we fixed an issue where the app would display a white screen on startup and fail to load properly.

apps.name: Minibits
apps.localizedDescription: Minibits is an ecash and Lightning wallet exploring how ₿-backed ecash can enable instant, cheap, and private value transfer.

versions.localizedDescription: New release packages fixes and stability improvements and an upgrade of most libraries to latest versions.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app requires access to the camera to scan QR codes.
privacy.NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: This app uses notifications to keep you updated with incoming transactions.

versions.localizedDescription: New release includes various security improvements and a new feature to enter any transaction amount in fiat currency. Now available on Freedom Store.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app requires access to the camera to scan QR codes.
privacy.NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: This app uses notifications to keep you updated with incoming transactions.

versions.localizedDescription: This is Minibits' first iOS version available on Freedom Store.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app requires access to the camera to scan QR codes.
privacy.NSUserNotificationsUsageDescription: This app uses notifications to keep you updated with incoming transactions.

apps.name: Bitkit: Bitcoin & LN Wallet
apps.localizedDescription: Bitkit is a simple, yet powerful self-custodial wallet, powering Bitcoin payments to anyone, anywhere, any time.

versions.localizedDescription: Bitkit is a simple, yet powerful self-custodial wallet, powering Bitcoin payments to anyone, anywhere, any time.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: The camera is used to scan qrcodes in order to import or send Bitcoin and assets.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Enabling Face ID allows you quick and secure access to your account.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: The photo library is used to scan qrcodes in order to import or send Bitcoin and assets.

apps.name: Sovran
apps.localizedDescription: Sovran is a Cashu wallet for sending and receiving Bitcoin with integrated Nostr functionality, enabling rich social interactions.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Sovran will use your camera to scan QR codes to make it easier to send and receive payments.

apps.name: Flash
apps.localizedDescription: Flash is helping bring the digital finance ecosystem to the Caribbean. A great wallet for beginners, Flash is designed to make your first steps in bitcoin simple.

versions.localizedDescription: Flash Mobile App Version [v0.4.1], UI Redesign, Advanced Mode Improvements, Nostr Profile Optimization

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Flash will use your camera to scan QR codes to make it easier to send and receive payments.
